content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

choices.label: It prints true if a is true and b is false, and prints false otherwise.
It prints true if a and b have different values, and prints false otherwise.
It prints true if a and b have the same value, and prints false otherwise.
It prints false for all possible values of a and b.

content.answer: It prints true if a and b have different values, and prints false otherwise.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
